techmeme.title: Under new Biden rules, countries with caps on compute power are restricted to 50,000 advanced GPUs, which could grow to 100K in deals with the US government (Associated Press)
Sonos CEO Patrick Spence is leaving following a botched app revamp that upset customers and stymied growth; board member Tom Conrad is named interim CEO (Mark Gurman/Bloomberg)
Overland AI, which is developing off-road self-driving systems for military purposes, raised a $32M Series A led by 8VC (Colin Demarest/Axios)
OpenAI publishes an "economic blueprint" for AI, calling on the new Trump administration to boost investment from the Middle East and avoid strict regulations (New York Times)
Qventus, which builds AI-based tools to automate health care work, raised a $105M Series D, including $85M in equity and $20M in optional debt (Ingrid Lunden/TechCrunch)
